q: Corporation is transforming audiences and dazzling critics with its insightful and compelling analysis. Taking its status as a legal`` person'' to the logical conclusion, the film puts the corporation on the psychiatrist's couch to ask What kind of person is it? The Corporation includes interviews with 40 corporate insiders and critics- including Noam Chomsky , Naomi Klein , Milton Friedman , Howard Zinn , Vandana Shiva and Michael Vick Moore- plus true confessions, case studies and strategies for change.`` AN OVERWHELMING AMOUNT

His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan.`` He's my first Division I recruit,'' the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves.
